name: Marriage Flipper
description:
Created by a team of 3 for Global Game Jam 2020 with the theme of "Repair", this game revolves around a child repairing their parent's failing relationship through various tasks.

Won 2nd place prize at the BCU jam site.

Credits: 

Taylor Keeling - Art Director and Programmer

Callum Flanagan - Sound Director and Art

Samuel Goff - Lead Programmer and Art
